Title: Inflatable
Writer: Vince Gilligan (created by), Peter Gould (created by), Gordon Smith, Ann Cherkis (executive story editor), Gordon Smith (story editor)
Actors: Bob Odenkirk, Jonathan Banks, Rhea Seehorn, Patrick Fabian
Plot: When Mike's hand is forced, he can no longer hide his frustration; Mike and Jimmy work together to keep the peace.
